sense.def:
Kadar ljudje ali živali
stray
, odtavajo proč od tam, kjer bi morale biti.

seg.quote: Children had strayed on to an airport runway.
I hoped my animals wouldn't stray too far.

sense.def:
A stray animal
je žival, ki je odtavala proč od lastnikovega doma.

One's thoughts stray
rečemo, kadar se ne osredotočamo več na določen predmet.

seg.quote: He let his thoughts stray for five minutes.
He does not stray from facts.

sense.def:
Stvari, ki so
stray
, so se ločile od drugih, podobnih stvari.

seg.quote: A hen was pecking around for stray grains of corn.
